Love And 
      Lies
Tuesday, June 5, at 10 
      p.m. ET/PT
A young mother named Jennifer 
      Corbin was having an online affair. When she was found dead, police 
      thought it was suicide.
 
But there was a bizarre link 
      to a long-forgotten case.  
      Fourteen years earlier, a dental student named Dolly Hearn 
      committed suicide, too.
 
Or did she? 
      
 
Peter Van Sant reports for 48 Hours Mystery, tonight at 
      10 p.m. ET/PT.
 
Watch Van Sant's 
      Notebook.
